arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Bournemouth – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur welcome AFC Bournemouth to North London on Saturday, with Thomas Frank’s side aiming to continue their perfect start to the season. After an opening-day win over Burnley and a statement victory at Manchester City, Spurs are one of only three teams with maximum points.
